AUTHOR: PookaMustard
INSTALL_MSG: Bing cog installed. To start, use %bing. You can also set %bingadultsets for server and %bingadultsetc for channel to allow for searches without SafeSearch enabled.
NAME: Bing
SHORT: Bing cog that searches Bing for web, images, videos and news.
DESCRIPTION: Bing cog that searches Bing for web, images, videos and news, with a larger focus on image search. JSON code copied from Mash's IMDb cog, complete with permission to use it. Requires py-bing-search to work.
